classification_method: Pre-assigned categorical labels from AlphaMissense TSV file (column 4: am_class)
classification_rule: NOT derived from thresholds applied in this pipeline. The am_class values (benign, ambiguous, pathogenic) come directly from the AlphaMissense model output, which was calibrated by Cheng et al. to achieve 90% precision on ClinVar pathogenic variants.

thresholds_for_reference_only.note: These thresholds correspond to the categorical labels but are NOT applied by this pipeline â€” the labels are used as-is from the source file.

columns_used.am_pathogenicity: Continuous score (0-1) from AlphaMissense TSV column 3
columns_used.am_class: Categorical label from AlphaMissense TSV column 4 (benign/ambiguous/pathogenic)

patient_level_derivation.has_am_pathogenic: True if patient has >= 1 variant with am_class == 'pathogenic'

match_rate: 99.4% of queried variants had AlphaMissense annotations
intended_use: Research/benchmark only. NOT for clinical variant reclassification or treatment decisions.
